text.text: Krikzz / Terraonion Video game console add-on Fourth 2019 CD-Rom, Cartridge 3/6 button gamepad, gun

text.name: sys_description
text.text: In fact there are 2 systems. Krikzz's MSU-MD driver released in 2020, which interfaces cartridge music calls with CD hardware, intended for the Mega Everdrive Pro. And the Terraonion MD+ released in 2019, carried by ekeeke, which does the same thing from their Mega-SD cartridge. Both implementations have their respective strengths and weaknesses, they both allow the conversion of cartridge games into Mega CD games with support for audio tracks. The difference is mainly in the support by emulators and the hacker scene.
